General.Name: Suofeiya Home Collection Co Ltd
General.Description: Suofeiya Home Collection Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacturing, and sale of furniture products in the People's Republic of China. It offers kitchen cabinets, closets and wardrobes, vanity cabinets, built-in furniture, interior doors, floors, loose furniture, hardware and accessories, materials and finishes, and countertop systems. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, the People's Republic of China.
